name: Easy Geocaching Links
author: Simon Szustkowski

sections.description:
Ever wanted linking to a cache- or trackable listing page on geocaching.com?
Simply type the cache-id or public trackable-id in your text, and the plugin automatically changes them into links to the listing pages.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the extracted archive to ‘wp-content/plugins/’
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu
  3. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
Do i need an account on geocaching.com?

No.

Do the IDs need to be written in capital letters?

Yes, as they are usually written in capital letters.

Do the tracking-id of the trackable items work, too?

No, because geocaching.com provides no search ability for these IDs.

Are you somehow associated with Groundspeak?

No, i am just a regular geocacher. ðŸ˜‰

What is your geocaching-nickname, then?

I call myself simonszu.

Does this plugin have an options page?

No, it is so lightweight that it doesn’t need any options.

You are so cool. I want to donate money.

Go to http://blog.tatonka.info/geocaching/cache-links-plugin-fur-wordpress/ and feel free to use the flattr-button.
sections.changelog:
1.3

*Fixed a bug when mentioning the Gnu C Compiler (GCC) in a post.

1.2

*Fixed a bug with GC-Codes which are written between brackets.

1.1

*Added compatibility with gcStats, since GCSTATS was interpreted as a Geocache-ID.
*Thanks to Rob Mech for reporting this bug.

1.0

  • Just published this plugin.
  • No changes

short_description: Changes Geocaching-IDs into Links to their listing pages on geocaching.com
description:
Ever wanted linking to a cache- or trackable listing page on geocaching.com?
Simply type the cache-id or public trackable-id in your text, and the plugin automatically changes them into links to the listing pages.
